results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project ab037592928243e1b0651260b9908b6b. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and regression tests are in place.
arguments.description: Track work on fixing the login page to support special characters in passwords.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 34f1ba06b7494709a4ecb39e283e7950:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
